text: @Acosta @Brachypelma193 As if the Coronavirus task force, run by @VP & @jaredkushner, knows how to model this public health crisis. We need Dr’s Fauci and Birx in charge NOT uneducated twits who THINK they understand the issues. Too many people have died already because of the Trump Admin’s incompetence
